original_title: Sonata Arctica - For the Sake of Revenge
overview: A live album and DVD recorded by the Finnish power metal band Sonata Arctica. It was recorded at Shibuya AX, Tokyo, Japan on February 5, 2005.
tagline: Shibuya AX in Tokyo, Japan on 5 February 2005
title: Sonata Arctica - For the Sake of Revenge
